ACCOUNT.description: The Snowflake account name to connect to.
ACCOUNT.title: ACCOUNT

WAREHOUSE.description: The name of the virtual warehouse to be used for the session.
WAREHOUSE.title: WAREHOUSE

USER.description: The username to authenticate with Snowflake.
USER.title: USER

PASSWORD.description: The password for the specified user.
PASSWORD.title: PASSWORD

ROLE.description: The role to be assumed during the session.
ROLE.title: ROLE

DATABASE.description: The name of the Snowflake database to connect to.
DATABASE.title: DATABASE

SCHEMA.description: The schema within the database where queries will be executed.
SCHEMA.title: SCHEMA
